title: Textile, 1960–67
medium:
Medium: cotton, rayon
Technique: plain weave with continuous supplementary weft patterning
description: A bright violet ground with an iridescent quality created by using magenta warps and bright blue wefts, with wide pattern bands of zigzags and geometric forms in shiny golden rayon yarns. Fringed at both ends.
